what will I get if I reverted to Islam ?
you’ll get three things :
1) Inner peace, dignity, happiness in this life .
2) all past sins no matter how big it is wiped away in condition of not doing it again
3) Go to heavens in the hereafter.
As a new revert to Islam, what should I do?
Firstly as you know and keep it always in your mind that Islam is :
1) bearing witness that there is no god besides Allah and Muhammad is the messenger of Allah
2) pray to Allah
3)give the obligatory charity “the zakat “
4)fast the month of Ramadan .
5)to go on pilgrimage to maccah when you able to do it .
Secondly you need to believe in your heart by six things:
1) Believe that there is one god “ALLAH”
2) Believe that there is an angels of Allah.
3)believe that there is books has been revealed from Allah .i.e. papers”suhuf”given to Abraham , zaboor given to david ,tourah given to muses ,bible given to jesus ,quran given to muhammed peace be upon all of them .
4)believe that there is prophets that has been sent by Allah .i.e. adam , noah , hood , saleh , shoaib,Abraham,Ismael,Israel,lout,muses,jeses, .etc and the last one is Muhammad peace be upon all of them.
5) that there is a day of judgment where all people will be resurrected and asked of what they did in their life .
6) and the destiny of Allah .
What else should I do or don’t do?
1) don’t cheat .
2) don’t lie.
3) don’t drink alcohol .
4) don’t gamble .
5) don’t make adultery.
6) don’t eat prohibited food .
7) respect your parents and obey them unless they ordered you something contradicts with your religion but still you’ve got to stay loving and helping them in their needs .
8) raise your children and be a good parents teach them how to pray how to fast and all Islamic aspects.
9) respect your relatives and pray for them to become Muslims too.
10) be good to your neighbors and don’t hesitate on helping them if they need something .
11)give charity to poor people as much as you can.
12) don’t kill your children i.e. “intentional abortion” .
13) don’t steal or rape or anything bad .
14) do good deeds as much as you can .
15)and finally read Quran and the teachings of prophet Muhammad peace be upon him.
Now how do I pray?
Before you pray you need to know how to do prayer ablution which is :
1)wash your hands 3 times .
2)wash your mouth and nose 3 times .
3)wash your complete face 3 times .
4)wash your arms “from your fingers to the elbow “ 3 times.
5)wipe your head and ears by your wet hands 1 time .
6)wash your feet to the ankle bone 3 times .
And that’s it but you need to know that you must do it again if you do farting.
And another condition that will be the first to do in case you’ve excreted or urinated which is
1-1) washing the vulva “the private parts”.
And then repeat the previous steps of prayer ablution.
Additional thing for the woman in case she was under the monthly period “menstruation” that neither the prayer nor the fasting of Ramadan Is required for her until the menstruation ends ,and after it ends she need to wash all of her body and do the prayer ablution while she is washing.
“Another thing is that mating is prohibited during the menstruation until it stops”.
Note that washing the entire body is required once you revert to Islam for men and women.
Additional thing for men that they have to wash all of their body with the prayer ablution in case of semen came out.
Secondly how to pray:
There are videos teach you how to pray but you need to know that you have to memorize the following:
1) the first chapter of the Quran “alfatiha soora” with at least one another chapter “you can memorize the shortest chapters “you can choose from the chapter 108 to the chapter 114” in Arabic pronunciation.
2) You can memorize this in English and this takes place in the “tashahud” part
“ all praises ,and sincere good prayers to Allah , peace and blessings be upon you o prophet ,peace be upon us and upon the good worshippers of Allah ,I bear witness that there is no gods besides Allah and Muhammad is the messenger of Allah” . the second part of “tashahud” - “o god praise Muhammad and his family as you praised Ibraheem and his family and give blessing to Muhammad and his family as you gave blessings to Ibraheem and his family , you’re the praiser the glorious “

Earth is an average size planet, the average distance away from an average size star. There is no logical reason to believe that the physical processes which birthed our star and planet would not play out in countless other areas of the unimaginably vast universe. It's actually incredibly hard to imagine there NOT being a billion billion eaths out there.

Unfortunately, all the advance civilisations have been watching Earth and decided... "Erm no, absolutely no way, they are CRAZY! 😵  We don't want them coming here, with their crazy leaders, pollution, wars, corruption, infections... just shut all the blinds, lock the doors, pretend we're not in. Give it a few more decades and they'll have disappeared and we can go play outside again." 👍👽👍
